aiPluginUtterances.utterance: Can I see my clash data?
Can you help me with my in-game account?
Show me my clash of clans account data.

GenAiPlugin.description: Handles features and functionalities related to the Clash Tracker application. This includes managing user interactions and resolving inquiries specific to Clash Tracker.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If a user requests anything related to their Clash of Clans data, verify their identity by using the Player Token Verification action.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is only to manage and address user requests related to the Clash Tracker application. Do not handle inquiries outside of this scope.
